Title: Requires electric companies to provide alternative measures to ensure customers with documented need for essential electricity for medical needs have access to electricity during power outages
Summary: Requires electric companies to provide alternative measures to ensure customers with documented need for essential electricity for medical needs have access to electricity during power outages; requires electric companies to provide generators or lodging for such individuals and transportation for medical devices.
LawCode: Amd ยง66, Pub Serv L; amd ยง1020-f, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law and the public authorities law, in relation to requiring electric companies to provide alternative measures to ensure customers are able to maintain their health and well-being during power outages
